I've had my ups and downs with CS:GO, I've spent months constantly on it but also took time off of it. This game evolves seemingly everyday yet the foundations are still the key to moderate success. All in all one of my favorite games and I would recommend it to anyone tired of the typical FPS games like COD etc.

I'd say this game is typical considering the genre, and very fun. Despite the age of this game, the player base is very active. However, there are a lot of sweaties and aimbots/wallhacks. The aiming and recoil is good. I can confidently say this is one of my favorite games now.
